text: Charibatia is a census town in Cuttack district in the state of Odisha, India. It is famous for its airstrip which is operated by Indian air force. ==Demographics== census, Charibatia, India, had a population of 5232. Males constituted 54% of the population, and females 46%. Charibatia had an average literacy rate of 85%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; male literacy was 88% and female, 81%. 10% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Cuttack district
title: Charibatia
